languages.text: "Зачем сдерживать гнев в отношении столь порочной твари? Дай ему волю!"

traits.locale_text: "Зачем сдерживать гнев в отношении столь порочной твари? Дай ему волю!"

languages.text: "Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"
languages.original_text: "Зачем сдерживать гнев в отношении столь порочной твари? Дай ему волю!"

traits.locale_text: "Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"
"Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"
"Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"
"Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"
"Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"

languages.text: 「奴のように腐敗した生き物を相手にする時、どうして怒りを抑えるのかだと？怒りを解放しろ！」
languages.original_text: "Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"

traits.locale_text: 「奴のように腐敗した生き物を相手にする時、どうして怒りを抑えるのかだと？怒りを解放しろ！」

languages.text: “和这种邪恶的家伙打交道，为什么还要压抑你的愤怒呢？释放你的怒火就对了！”
languages.original_text: "Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"

traits.locale_text: “和这种邪恶的家伙打交道，为什么还要压抑你的愤怒呢？释放你的怒火就对了！”

languages.text: « Pourquoi réfréner votre fureur face à une créature aussi corrompue ? Laissez libre cours à votre colère ! »
languages.original_text: "Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi réfréner votre fureur face à une créature aussi corrompue ? Laissez libre cours à votre colère ! »

languages.text: «¿Por qué contiene su ira contra un ser tan corrupto como este? ¡Desate su furia!».
languages.original_text: "Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué contiene su ira contra un ser tan corrupto como este? ¡Desate su furia!».

languages.text: "Weshalb Eure Wut zurückhalten, wenn Ihr es mit einer derart verderbten Kreatur zu tun habt? Entfesselt Euren Zorn!"
languages.original_text: "Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"

traits.locale_text: "Weshalb Eure Wut zurückhalten, wenn Ihr es mit einer derart verderbten Kreatur zu tun habt? Entfesselt Euren Zorn!"

languages.text: "Bunun gibi yozlaşmış bir mahluka karşı neden öfkeni dizginliyorsun? Hiddetini serbest bırak!"
languages.original_text: "Why restrain your anger when you're dealing with a creature as corrupt as he? Unleash your fury!"

traits.locale_text: "Bunun gibi yozlaşmış bir mahluka karşı neden öfkeni dizginliyorsun? Hiddetini serbest bırak!"
